thread.title_full: Lamar Odom Paid $75,000 for Days of Sex?v

title: Lamar Odom Paid $75,000 for Days of Sex?v
text:
Get Entertainment Alerts 
17 Oct 2015 12:48 PM EST Retired basketball star Lamar Odom, who remained unresponsive Thursday in a Las Vegas hospital after he was found unconscious at the Love Ranch this week, paid $75,000 for 24-hour-a-day companionship from two women, the brothel's owner told NBC News Thursday. Odom used a credit card to take care of the five-day package, which Love Ranch owner Dennis Hof said included sex and activities like cooking, watching TV together and going out to dinner â€” a deal commonly called the "girlfriend experience."
